text: @NYGovCuomo What makes you think there will be a vaccine for #COVID when there's never been a vaccine for any coronavirus? We don't even have an actual flu vaccine, & flu kills 60K-80K+ every year. Stop shoveling the BS. I'd never take a vaccine anyway; I don't trust you, Gates, Fauci, etc.
